mapper.insert: insert into tboard values(null, #{categoryno}, #{title} , #{content} , #{summary}, #{views} , #{insertuserno} , now() , #{modifyuserno}, now() );
mapper.select: SELECT tb.BOARD_NO, tb.TITLE, tb.INSERT_DATE, tb.VIEWS, tu.USER_NAME FROM tboard tb JOIN tuser tu ON tb.INSERT_USER_NO = tu.USER_NO WHERE tb.CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} AND (#{search} IS NULL OR tb.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')) ORDER BY tb.BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tboard tb JOIN tuser tu ON tb.INSERT_USER_NO = tu.USER_NO WHERE tb.CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} AND (#{search} IS NULL OR tb.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TFILE (CATEGORY_NO, FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_SAVE_NAME, FILE_PATH, INSERT_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{categoryNo}, #{fileOriginName}, #{fileSaveName}, #{filePath}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT tb.CONTENT, tb.TITLE, tb.VIEWS, tb.INSERT_DATE, tu.USER_NAME, tu.NATIONLITY FROM tboard tb,tuser tu WHERE tb.INSERT_USER_NO = tu.USER_NO AND BOARD_NO = #{boardno}
